content: I'm looking for a studio that offers Hatha and Vinyasa classes, and preferably with a more spiritual approach. I'm open to trying out different studios, so no specific location in mind. I live in [city name]. By the way, the yoga retreat I attended last month was amazing, it included several workshops on mindfulness, meditation, and breathwork, and one of the workshops focused on using yoga to reduce stress, which has been really helpful.
